channel.title: LFT - C++ Text Based Game!
channel.description:
Alright so, since ILikeArrays, kinda just left his project. I'm gonna start it. & I'm gonna use his template, because I'm not creative ^^ I know as little to C++ to any of you reading and wanna join this team. But I do know the basics and just a tiny bit more.
[b]Intro:[/b] The idea is to make a simple console based game using C++. The project is aimed to allow people to learn C++. If you consider yourself to be at the intermediate or pro level of C++ this is not for you. Instead this is for people who have no clue who know what they are doing and are interested in learning C++.
[b]Open Source:[/b] We will be open source. I still need to check into svn plugins with visual/eclipse.
[b]Developers:[/b] [u]MatiasMunk[/u] Skype: MatiasMunk1995
[b]IDE:[/b] If your new to C++ and looking for an IDE I'd recommend you to use [url=http://www.microsoft.com/visualstudio/en-us/products/2010-editions/visual-cpp-express]Microsoft Visual C++[/url]
[b]The Game:[/b] So far a game idea still needs to be brainstormed.
[b]Goals:[/b] Goals are the most important part of this project and everyone should learn. I will go more into detail on the goals of the project when a game idea gets brainstormed.
[b]Info[/b] Name: No idea yet Started: --/--/--
[b]Source[/b] Will come when project is done.
[b]Other updates[/b] None yet

item.title: LFT - C++ Text Based Game!
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Alright so, since ILikeArrays, kinda just left his project. I’m gonna start it.
& I’m gonna use his template, because I’m not creative ^^
I know as little to C++ to any of you reading and wanna join this team.
But I do know the basics and just a tiny bit more.

Intro:
The idea is to make a simple console based game using C++. The project is aimed to allow people to learn C++. If you consider yourself to be at the intermediate or pro level of C++ this is not for you. Instead this is for people who have no clue who know what they are doing and are interested in learning C++.

Open Source:
We will be open source. I still need to check into svn plugins with visual/eclipse.

Developers:
MatiasMunk
Skype: MatiasMunk1995

IDE:
If your new to C++ and looking for an IDE I’d recommend you to use Microsoft Visual C++

The Game:
So far a game idea still needs to be brainstormed.

Goals:
Goals are the most important part of this project and everyone should learn. I will go more into detail on the goals of the project when a game idea gets brainstormed.
